00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/queue.h>
00024 
00025 /* Creation flags */
00026 #define XNSYNCH_FIFO    0x0
00027 #define XNSYNCH_PRIO    0x1
00028 #define XNSYNCH_NOPIP   0x0
00029 #define XNSYNCH_PIP     0x2
00030 #define XNSYNCH_DREORD  0x4
00031 
00032 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00033 
00034 #define XNSYNCH_CLAIMED 0x8     /* Claimed by other thread(s) w/ PIP */
00035 
00036 /* Spare flags usable by upper interfaces */
00037 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE0  0x01000000
00038 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE1  0x02000000
00039 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE2  0x04000000
00040 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE3  0x08000000
00041 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE4  0x10000000
00042 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE5  0x20000000
00043 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE6  0x40000000
00044 #define XNSYNCH_SPARE7  0x80000000
00045 
00046 /* Statuses */
00047 #define XNSYNCH_DONE    0       /* Resource available / operation complete */
00048 #define XNSYNCH_WAIT    1       /* Calling thread blocked -- start rescheduling */
00049 #define XNSYNCH_RESCHED 2       /* Force rescheduling */
00050 
00051 struct xnthread;
00052 struct xnsynch;
00053 struct xnmutex;
00054 
00055 typedef struct xnsynch {
00056 
00057     xnpholder_t link;   /* Link in claim queues */
00058 
00059 #define link2synch(laddr) \
00060 ((xnsynch_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnsynch_t *)0)->link)))
00061 
00062     xnflags_t status;   /* Status word */
00063 
00064     xnpqueue_t pendq;   /* Pending threads */
00065 
00066     struct xnthread *owner; /* Thread which owns the resource */
00067 
00068     XNARCH_DECL_DISPLAY_CONTEXT();
00069 
00070 } xnsynch_t;
00071 
00072 #define xnsynch_test_flags(synch,flags)  testbits((synch)->status,flags)
00073 #define xnsynch_set_flags(synch,flags)   setbits((synch)->status,flags)
00074 #define xnsynch_clear_flags(synch,flags) clrbits((synch)->status,flags)
00075 #define xnsynch_wait_queue(synch)        (&((synch)->pendq))
00076 #define xnsynch_nsleepers(synch)         countpq(&((synch)->pendq))
00077 #define xnsynch_owner(synch)             ((synch)->owner)
00078 
00079 #ifdef __cplusplus
00080 extern "C" {
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 void xnsynch_init(xnsynch_t *synch,
00084                   xnflags_t flags);
00085 
00086 #define xnsynch_destroy(synch) \
00087 xnsynch_flush(synch,XNRMID)
00088 
00089 static inline void xnsynch_set_owner (xnsynch_t *synch, struct xnthread *thread) {
00090     synch->owner = thread;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void xnsynch_sleep_on(xnsynch_t *synch,
00094                       xnticks_t timeout);
00095 
00096 struct xnthread *xnsynch_wakeup_one_sleeper(xnsynch_t *synch);
00097 
00098 xnpholder_t *xnsynch_wakeup_this_sleeper(xnsynch_t *synch,
00099                                          xnpholder_t *holder);
00100 
00101 int xnsynch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch,
00102                   xnflags_t reason);
00103 
00104 void xnsynch_release_all_ownerships(struct xnthread *thread);
00105 
00106 void xnsynch_renice_sleeper(struct xnthread *thread);
00107 
00108 void xnsynch_forget_sleeper(struct xnthread *thread);
00109 
00110 struct xnthread *xnsynch_forget_one_sleeper(xnsynch_t *synch);
00111 
00112 #ifdef __cplusplus
00113 }
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__ */
00117 
00118 #endif /* !_XENO_NUCLEUS_SYNCH_H_ */
